name: On Bad Days She's Pure White
name_original: On Bad Days She's Pure White
description:
Done for Yuri Jam 2018 but... it's not reached the Yuri at all yet XD. Done in LÖVE, from mostly scratch, but I've credited some resources in the "Credit" page.

Gillian, an immortal, travels to meet with an online friend, June, irl for the first time.
